named-query.name: Restaurante.existsByResponsavel
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Restaurante rest join rest.responsaveis resp where rest.id = :restauranteId and resp.id = :usuarioId

named-query.name: Pedido.isPedidoGerenciadoPor
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Pedido p join p.restaurante rest join rest.responsaveis resp where p.codigo = :codigoPedido and resp.id = :usuarioId
